column2:
"W-welcome back.
I'm really glad that you
came back safely."

"ARKS have to have courage to fight
such a big hostile, don't you.
I wonder if I can do it..."

"Uh, did you wonder why I thought of
becoming ARKS?
Oh, well, um..."

"...c-could it wait until next time?
I-I'm embarrassed."

"A-anyway, thank you
very much.
Well, until next time."
